com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.cache

Class CacheObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.cache.CacheObservable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CacheImpl

    @Synchronized
public abstract class CacheObservable
extends Object
    This Class may be extended by any CacheImplementation.

    This makes it easier for you.. just use it.. You know you want it.. It gives you cookies!

    Since:
    1.0

    1.0
